title: Lee Sin W (Safeguard)
body: Lee Sin can't use self-cast W while snared. Was this intentional? It sucks that he can't grant himself the shield if he gets caught by a Dark Binding.

replies.body: Probably because self casted or not his w is still a dash, which is cancelled due to root effects. (yasuo's e portrait is grayed out when he is snared, meaning the entire ability has been disabled)
